body:
Hi Tasos,

I was using Azure to host all my files that is needed for DesignExplorer.

Microsoft provide a free 1 G storage web host on Azure, and here is the link:[https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/app-service/](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/app-service/http://)



Microsoft will give you a customized domain, such as [http://yoursite.azurewebsites.net](http://yoursite.azurewebsites.net), and then after you uploaded all images, you can access files by [http://yoursite.azurewebsites.net/yourfolder/image.jpg](http://yoursite.azurewebsites.net/yourfolder/image.jpg), and you can use this link for DesignExplorer.
